description:
As a user on the DADI.cloud home page they should be able to click the documentation link in the header and be taken
  to the DADI.tech website

elements.name: Check documentation link works

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user clicks on the documentation link
I expect that the title is "DADI Documentation"

name: Home page documentation link

description:
As a user on the DADI.cloud home page they should be able to click the links in the header and be taken to the
  relevant screen

elements.name: Check header links go to the correct page

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user clicks on the "Overview" header link http://beta2.dadi.cloud/"en"
I expect that the title is "Decentralized web services | DADI"

elements.name: Check header links go to the correct page

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user clicks on the "Roadmap" header link http://beta2.dadi.cloud/"en/roadmap"
I expect that the title is "Roadmap | DADI"

elements.name: Check header links go to the correct page

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user clicks on the "Network" header link http://beta2.dadi.cloud/"en/network"
I expect that the title is "Network | DADI"

elements.name: Check header links go to the correct page

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user clicks on the "Knowledge" header link http://beta2.dadi.cloud/"en/knowledge"
I expect that the title is "Knowledge | DADI"

elements.name: Check header links go to the correct page

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user clicks on the "Token" header link http://beta2.dadi.cloud/"en/token"
I expect that the title is "Token | DADI"

elements.name: Check header links go to the correct page

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user clicks on the "Partners" header link http://beta2.dadi.cloud/"en/partners"
I expect that the title is "Partners | DADI"

elements.name: Check header links go to the correct page

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user clicks on the "Team" header link http://beta2.dadi.cloud/"en/team"
I expect that the title is "The Team | DADI"

name: Home page header links check

description:
As a user on the DADI.cloud home page they should be able to click on the web services header link
  and be shown a new sub menu with links to the 5 product web pages

elements.name: Check web services links appear

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user clicks on the web services header link
the sub menu is displayed
there should be a link for "web"
there should be a link for "publish"
there should be a link for "api"
there should be a link for "cdn"
there should be a link for "queue"

name: Home page web services links

description: As a user on the DADI.cloud home page they are able to view and interact with the Roadmaps section

elements.name: Roadmap Update section labelled

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user scrolls to the Roadmap Updates section
the title "ROADMAP UPDATES" should be displayed
I expect that header "#stickContainer .col:nth-of-type(1) .hdr" matches the text "ROADMAP UPDATES"
the element "//span[text()='Roadmap updates']" is visible

elements.name: 6 articles showing

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user scrolls to the Roadmap Updates section
there should be 6 Roadmap update articles visible

elements.name: Each article has a primary badge

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user scrolls to the Roadmap Updates section
there should be 6 primary Roadmap badges

elements.name: Each primary badge should be a link to the Roadmap page

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user scrolls to the Roadmap Updates section
there should be 6 clickable primary Roadmap badges to the Roadmap page

elements.name: Each article has a secondary badge

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user scrolls to the Roadmap Updates section
there should be 6 secondary badges

elements.name: Each article has a clickable title and description below it

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user scrolls to the Roadmap Updates section
there should be 6 clickable article titles
6 article descriptions

elements.name: Each article has a footer that contains a date, a team member name and an image

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user scrolls to the Roadmap Updates section
there should be 6 valid dates
there should be 6 team member names
there should be 6 team member images

elements.name: Roadmap section has a 'View all updates' link

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user scrolls to the Roadmap Updates section
there should be a "View all updates →" link

name: Roadmap section

description:
As a user on the DADI.cloud home page they should be able to click the social media icon links in the header
  and be taken to the relevant website in a new window

elements.name: Check social media icon links open the correct page in a new window

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user clicks on the social media icon for "github" in the header "https://github.com/dadi"
I expect that the title is "DADI · GitHub"

elements.name: Check social media icon links open the correct page in a new window

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user clicks on the social media icon for "medium" in the header "https://medium.com/@daditech"
I expect that the title is "DADI – Medium"

elements.name: Check social media icon links open the correct page in a new window

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user clicks on the social media icon for "twitter" in the header "https://twitter.com/dadi"
I expect that the title is "DADI (@dadi) on Twitter"

elements.name: Check social media icon links open the correct page in a new window

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user clicks on the social media icon for "reddit" in the header "https://www.reddit.com/r/DADI/"
I expect that the title is "Decentralized web services"

elements.name: Check social media icon links open the correct page in a new window

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user clicks on the social media icon for "discord" in the header "https://discordapp.com/invite/3sEvuYJ"
I expect that the title is "Discord"

elements.name: Check social media icon links open the correct page in a new window

steps.name: a web browser is at the DADI.cloud home page
the user clicks on the social media icon for "telegram" in the header "https://t.me/dadichat"
I expect that the title is "Telegram: Contact @dadichat"

name: Home page social media links check
